Hello! How can I assist you today?
Hello
Hello! How can I assist you today?
what plans do you have
I'm sorry, I am a chatbot designed to assist with specific queries related to Osun State. Could you please provide more details about the information you're looking for?
i want information about your health plans

The Health Insurance Platform (HIP) manages health insurance plans among other processes. However, the specific details about the health insurance plans are not provided in the document. You may need to contact the Health Insurance Agencies or Health Management Organizations (HMOs) directly for this information.
Is it possible for an enrollee to change his/her Health Care Provider
Yes, it is possible for an enrollee to change his/her Health Care Provider after 6 months. The enrollee will need to visit OHIS Headquarters at Ogo-Oluwa to complete necessary forms on the process.
can i change healthcare provider
Yes, you can change your Health Care Provider after a period of 6 months. To do this, you will need to visit the OHIS Headquarters at Ogo-Oluwa to complete the necessary forms.
how much do i pay for a plan

For the general public or informal sector, it costs ₦12,066 for an individual to enroll, while ₦57,600 is charged for a family of 6 (father, mother and four biological children or legally adopted under the age of 18) for one year.
where can i get my id card??

If you're enrolling for the first time, your ID card will be issued to you upon enrollment. However, if you've lost or damaged your ID card, you can get a new one by visiting the OHIS Headquarters with a sworn affidavit. You'll need to fill a form requesting a new card and pay a token fee.
Se dandan ni eto yii ni abi fun eni to ba wu?

Bẹẹ ni. Ẹtọ naa ni fun ọpọlọpọ awọn eniyan tabi ẹgbẹ informal, o yẹ ki o naa ₦12,066 fun eniyan kan lati wa bebe, nigbati ₦57,600 yoo jẹ fun ẹbi kan ti o je ọmọ mẹrin (baba, iya ati awọn ọmọ biolojia mẹta tabi ti a gba lati ọdun kejila) fun ọdun kan.
